explanation: [0-0] Two hands are holding two pieces of animal vertebrae, with many bones scattered on the yellow ground in the distance.

[0-6] A person threads two metal wires through the bones. The shot cuts to a man squatting in front of the bones, picking up a string of strung bones. He then shows two larger bones in his hands, putting them together and securing them with string. Afterward, the man uses an electric drill to make holes in the bones. He uses wire to tie the bones together through the drilled holes. The man uses pliers to cut off the excess wire.
